markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Duskwalker Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1373) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=257" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 38 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your connection to psychopomps gives you the power to glimpse the near future and protect corpses from the ravages of undeath. You can cast [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=15) and [_gentle repose_](/Spells.aspx?ID=131) each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.
name: Duskwalker Magic
